did.head: Collection Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Smith College. Dept. of Spanish and Portuguese.

did.unittitle: Department of Spanish and Portuguese Records
did.abstract: This collection is in one box and contains black and white photographs, news releases, newspaper articles, mid-year and final exam questions, students' class notes, and programs from theatrical performances.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Spanish Department at Smith College was established in 1902. By the 1914-1915 academic year, it was named the Spanish Language and Literature Department. By 1944-1945, its name changed to the Spanish and Portuguese Languages and Literature Department. The department was later called the Hispanic Studies Department from 1966-1967 until the 1981-1982 academic year when it received its current title as the Spanish and Portuguese Department.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Department of Spanish and Portuguese records contain materials describing the department's courses, clubs, and dramatic performances. Types of materials include black and white photographs, news releases, newspaper articles, mid-year and final exam questions, students' class notes, and programs from theatrical performances.

accessrestrict.p: The records are open for research according to the regulations of the Smith College Archives without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the documents must be requested from the Smith College Archives. Smith College owns copyright to any published material relating to college events and activities. Provenance and copyright ownership of other materials is unknown and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Smith College. Dept. of Spanish and Portuguese, Box #, Smith College Archives.

acqinfo.p: The Department of Spanish and Portuguese records were created by the department and donated to the College Archives.

did.unittitle: Student's class notes on Cervantes Undated
